Name: Story of Eve - A Hero's Study
About the game: The oracle foretold that the Demon Lord will rise again. People across the land are seized with fear. However, some heroes are rising up to the challenge, including a tanned female thief named Eve... Eve Rukia, newbie adventurer, has a crush on the Hero. She started her adventure to get stronger and catch his attention but things arenâ€˜t going well. Will she be able to become a hero or... Contents 6 Outfits - 'The less it covers, the more powerful it is!' 6 Violation Scenes - Eve's adventures don't always end well. 3 Special Events - Heart-pounding events between her adventures. 1 Nude Outfit - Technically, it's also an outfit. A simple rock-paper-scissors card battle RPG Costume Collection & Defeat Violation Illustrations By Sayika Produced By Smallsqurriel Spanish Translator By MatiasDesu Korean Translated By Nyanco Channel
